name: com.generic.eventbus
description:
EventBus is a messaging system used to facilitate loosely coupled
 communication between game objects. It helps prevent objects
 from being directly dependent on each other and allows for a 
cleaner code structure. The EventBus notifies objects
 that are subscribed to a specific event when that event is
 triggered (published). This way, it acts as a central hub for 
managing events.
